title: Sprint D (D1+D2) Integration: Guest Floor & Waiter Interface
body:
# Sprint D Integration: Guest Floor & Waiter Interface

This PR integrates all Sprint D work from both backend (Jules) and frontend (Web Claude - 6 agents).

## Summary

Successfully merged **1 backend branch** and **6 progressive frontend branches** to deliver the complete waiter workflow for guest floor order management.

### Backend Integration (Jules)
- Branch: feature/guest-floor-orders-d1
- Order model enhancements (round_number support)
- Guest floor workflow methods
- Database migrations

### Frontend Integration (Web Claude - 6 Agents)

Progressive development across 6 feature branches:

1. FE-1: claude/guest-floor-table-selection - Skeleton GuestFloorPage, route /front
2. FE-2: claude/add-waiter-floor-page - TableOrderPanel v1 with fallback logic
3. FE-3: claude/integrate-order-service - Rounds management, AddItemModal
4. FE-4: claude/add-item-flags - Item urgent/sync flags
5. FE-5: claude/table-color-coding - Time-based table colors (green-yellow-red)
6. FE-6: claude/polish-waiter-ui - PRODUCTION-READY TableOrderPanel

## Integration Verification

- All branches merged successfully
- TypeScript build passes
- Backend service starts successfully (health checks passing)
- Docker image builds successfully

## Technical Changes

- Unified OrderItem interface (removed duplicate definitions)
- Added round_number field to OrderItem
- Fixed is_urgent optionality
- Removed intermediate components/orders/ (replaced by components/waiter/)
- Frontend bundle: 750.41 kB (minified)

## Waiter Workflow

1. Waiter navigates to /front route
2. TableMap with time-based colors
3. Click table - TableOrderPanel opens
4. Manage rounds, add items
5. Send rounds to KDS
6. Track elapsed time per table

## Notes

- All 6 frontend agents built progressively on each other
- FE-6 is the final production version
- Backend endpoints have fallback logic for incomplete API implementation
- Ready for manual QA testing on /front route

Integration Complete - Ready for review and deployment
head: integration/sprint-d-guest-floor
